features: 【Stainless Steel Anti-aging & Waterproof】Anti-theft design doorbell bracket made of high-hardness stainless steel, More stronger, durable, anti-aging than plastic one. The doorbell box can be installed on the left or right side of the door, but the door must inward swinging.

【Compatible With Most Doors】Doorbell mount is suitable for most ring doorbell as ring doorbell 4/ 3/ 2/ 1/ B-link Video Doorbell and most doorbell. The maximum size of video doorbell should be less than height: 5.11in, width: 2.63in, thickness: 1.77in.

【No-Drill Easy to Install】It does not need to be drilled so you can install or uninstalls the doorbell mount in seconds, Put your ring doorbell inside and adjust the foam liner to fit your ring doorbell, then adjust the fixed clip according to your door thickness.

【Anti-theft safety design】doorbell box can 360° fully wrapped ring doorbell, keep your video doorbell from being stolen when the door is closed, provide a safe environment for home, apartment, office, condo and more.

【Top-Class Customer Service】Package Included: 1X anti-theft ring doorbell mount, installation instruction and various installation accessories.Enjoy 12-month worry-free warranty and friendly customer service. Any problem, please do feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount, No Drill Adjustable Video Doorbell Cover

Stainless Steel Aluminum Doorbell Mount Size (Length/ Width/ Height) 10/ 4.8/ 16 (CM); 3.93/ 1.88/ 6.2 (inch) Maximum Size of Doorbell Height: 5.11 in; Width: 2.63 in; Thickness: 1.77 in Doorbell Thickness 0.6-2.3 inch, the door gap must be greater than 0.06 inch For Ring Video Doorbell Ring Video Doorbell 4/ 3/ 2/ 1; Ring Video Doorbell Pro For Blink Video Doorbell Blink Video Doorbell and Most Doorbell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for ring doorbell
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mount! Fits my door perfectly with no damage or compromises off the door. Perfect for ring doorbell. I bought it because I'm a renter and can't wire or drill holes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anti-theft and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: It is made of stainless steel material and is very durable. The instructions are easy to understand, the installation is very simple, no drill is required, the ring camera holder box has a few pieces of foam that fit behind the ring camera to hold the camera in place! Then you just tighten the knob and the ring camera will be securely secured and won't be taken away.

reviews.reviewTitle: The case is metal big and chunky but no hole for the charging cable
reviews.reviewText: This is the only no-drill doorbell case that fits my Aosu doorbell camera. It is big and chunky compared to others and case is metal. See my photos.I have to cut the foam thru to the hold on the side so that the speaker can be heard.There is no hole at the bottom for the charger cable so I need to remove the camera every time I need to charge it which is a hassle.I don’t recommend this if there are other case that will fir your door camera. But unfortunately I don’t have any other choice

reviews.reviewTitle: Make sure your door has a bit of a gap
reviews.reviewText: The idea is great for rental homes or offices where you can't drill holes and screw things into the door or near it.But there has to be a gap between the door and the frame that will allow the thin metal mounting to pass through.Our door fits very well - in Canada that is important to block the cold wind in the winter.So this mount just did not work on our front door.In general the materials for the mount are strong and well made. I think it would work very well on the right door.There is a lot of flexibility in the door width that is accounted for by the screw down fitting.On the other hand, the screw down clamp is pretty ugly on the inside of your front door.So, for the right situation, a good product. Think it through before buying.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn’t work for me due to no door gap.
reviews.reviewText: I got this anti-theft ring doorbell mount because I liked that it’s removable. There were a couple of things I liked about this when I received it. The first thing is that it’s made of durable stainless steel material and the 2nd thing is it’s removable and you don’t have to screw it on.That being said, the things I don’t like is, it’s big and bulky. The main piece that goes over the door is too wide for my door and sticks out from the inside.I also had 2 issues during installation. The first issue was that one of the screws would not screw down all the way flat. I ended up stripping the screw and couldn’t take it out unfortunately. This could have been a problem, had I actually put something inside the mount prior to the trial installation. The 2nd issue was the fact that I couldn’t close my front door after installation. You need to ensure there’s enough of a gap between the door and the door frame. You can see from the photos, mine doesn’t have a gap. It appears that you need to remove the screws each time you have to recharge your camera device. This would be a hassle especially if you experience some difficulty with any of the screws like I did.The 2 main considerations prior to purchasing this anti-theft ring doorbell mount is, make sure you have a gap large enough between your door and door frame so you can close your door after installation. The other consideration is that you will have to unscrew it in order to recharge your camera device. If those don’t affect you, then this might be a decent option. Unfortunately, it didn’t work for me.
